title: Why do people keep asking questions to which the answer is blatantly obvious on Quora, which includes me? Why do I feel the urge to keep answering them? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because they are members of the Quora Partners Program. They can get paid for views of their question. If you go to their profile and see they have asked thousands of questions and answered very few and/or you see they have no info in their profile, then ……. Just mute and block them. As to why you want to answer them, I don’t know, but I do too sometimes. I guess it is just to show what a stupid question it is and how easy it is to find the answer.
